channel.title: Need A 24/7 Hoster/Co-Coder -GIVES OWNER-
channel.description:
Hello All you Moparscape Fans. It's Owner Steven Again. I'm Trying To Find A New Hoster/Co-Coder. I need them to host for 24/7. Please Post if you can. You Can Also Message Me If You Want. I Got a source coded from scratch. If you already gotta server, we can team up and code a huge ass source. Put your stuff on my source. It Will Be Awesome.
MODERATORS : Please Don't Lock. Move To The Correct Forums Section.
Thanks For Your Appreciation, -Owner Steven
P.S. - Posting Source/Client Today. But I'm in Different State. DONT DELETE TOPIC!

item.title: Need A 24/7 Hoster/Co-Coder -GIVES OWNER-
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

owner steven:

Put your stuff on my source. It Will Be Awesome.

Haha, because giving random strangers all your work is always a good idea.

You’re not allowed to request hosters or coders. This will be locked. Saying ‘Please Don’t Lock’ isn’t going to change that.
